price: Ɛberε a wͻhunuu Y’asotwee no, hwε! (Wͻbͻͻ mmͻden sε) wͻredwane no.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ أَحَسُّواْ بَأۡسَنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنۡهَا يَرۡكُضُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: falammā aḥassū basanā idhā hum min'hā yarkuḍūna
